channel.title: iTunesU on Mostly Technical
channel.description: Recent content in iTunesU on Mostly Technical

item.title: Download iTunes U Course - The Hacker Way
item.description: Today, kids, we are going to download iTunes U course almost exclusively from the command line. Why The easiest way to do that is to use iTunes to download all that for you. Unfortunately, while I have iPod/iPad in my home ecosystem, I don’t have any Mac computers. Thus, I’m running iTunes in a virtual machine on Windows. Imagine my user experience from such combination. Pure pain and suffering. There wouldn’t be this post if it was all smooth.
